recipesJson.name: Blueberry Cinnamon Pastry v2.0
recipesJson.author: EdibleMalfunction
recipesJson.description: This is reminiscent of a warm, gooey, sweet blueberry cinnamon roll. Good to go as is, but give it a few days to a week to steep and it turns into something incredible.

reviews.text: This is one of the better versions of this profile.  I get mostly blueberry and cinnamon without a lot of the pastry and gooeyness but its still very tasty.  Usually people fail at making this profile but I feel you hit it pretty well, just slight room for improvement.
Tasty bakery that has a lot going on. A bit imbalanced for me, a bit too blue distracting from the bakery, but a tasty vape indeed.

As others have said I absolutely love the blueberry note in this, which is not an easy task as it changes dramatically in respect to each recipes competing flavors. That being said the pastry was a little flat and dry for me. I've been on the hunt to figure out that 'gooey' aspect. Anyways well done!
Blueberry note is fantastic.  Very blueberry forward, but the pastry acts as a wonderful complement.  Gorgeous.

Beautiful blueberry flavor! I wouldn't have guessed blueberry and CDS could get along quite this well but they really do. Perfect pairing with morning coffee just like a fresh blueberry cinnamon roll would be, but with far fewer calories. Thank you for this!
